item.title: MIUI OS2.0.208.0.VMKCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi K60 Pro China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi K60 Pro China

Codename: socrates

Version: OS2.0.208.0.VMKCNXM | 15.0

Size: 8.1 GB

MD5: c470246401dda8c4fcbbb4db4e7d1e20

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: System stability
Fix: Errors occurred in some cases
Fix: Issues with animations when opening or closing apps
Updated the security patch to August 2025. Increased system security.
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Status bar wasn't displayed correctly in some cases
